Html:

Thanks for sharing this magic control and for the nice support as well.
well just download the code and use as a library

Dear Radioman,

 

Sorry for this question, I do not mean to ask you "Please Do it for me" , I want only simple guideline to start the task.

Thanks for sharing this fantastic control.
